name: Neon Zealot Babylon
description:
In active development! Beta is out now! (Platforms: Android, Windows, Browser, browser will be easiest to use) (The 64 bit apk is probably preferred, you will likely need to enable developer mode on your phone which isn't too hard)

Join the discord! https://discord.gg/x2d8KzgJjE

NZB is a farming game where the player will manage a small space station, using limited resources to grow plants and perfect gene lines for more efficient growing cycles. Rather than utilizing an ever-expanding space, the player will have a station with as few as 16 plots of land. Aside from space constraints, the player will have a limited amount of water, sunlight, and minerals to allocate. They will have an initial stock of seeds to choose from, however each successive harvest will produce slightly mutated seeds. To excel, the player will choose the best seeds from each generation to move forward, perhaps one that requires less water as an example.
